name: SumnTeam_RoboWastelandInc
description:
A simple game made for the 2021 Epic MegaJam. The game was build with UE5 and uses both Lumen and Nanite. It utilizes the Gameplay ability system that comes with the engine. 

AWSD - Move the Scavengers and P.E.W.P.E.W. units.

Mouse - Aim and control the direction of unit movement.

1 - Spawn a P.E.W.P.E.W. unit.

2. Spawn a Scavenger 3000.

E - Regain control of the Overlord Unit.

F - Take Control of a P.E.W.P.E.W. unit. Repeat to control a different unit.

G - Take Control of a Scavenger 3000. Repeat to control a different unit.

Space Bar - Allows the P.E.W.P.E.W unit to jump.

The game also utilizes hardware raytracing.
